item.description:
Something You Forgot...Along the Way. This talk and discussion will present heart-warming stories that will explore life's basic truths, and spiritual and psychological insights. They will inspire you to look deeply within yourself and stir the aspiration to seek your inner potential of wisdom and compassion. Readings from the book with the same title of this talk, written by Kentetsu Takamori. Presented by Senpai.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Middletown Buddhist Meetup at Wesleyan (practice is open to all)
